text.0: more beauteous than the beautiful as indras bolt this soma rich in sweets hath clamoured in the vat.
text.1: dropping with oil abundant streams of sacrifice flow unto him like milchkine lowing with their milk.
text.2: on flows that ancient one whom hitherward from heaven sped through the region of the air the falcon snatched.
text.3: he quivering with alarm and terrified in heart before bowarmed kṛśānu holdeth fast the sweet.
text.4: may those first freshest drops of soma juice effused flow on their way to bring us mighty strength in kine.
text.5: beauteous as serpents worthy to be looked upon they whom each sacred gift and all our prayers have pleased.
text.6: may that muchlauded indu with a heart inclined to us wellknowing fight against our enemies.
text.7: he who hath brought the germ beside the strong ones seat moves onward to the widelyopcned stall of kine.
text.8: the active potent juice of heaven is flowing on great varuṇa whom the forward man can neer deceive.
text.9: mitra the holy hath been pressed for troubled times neighing like an impatient horse amid the herd.
